dialog.description:
The Arbol Verde Nuclear Power Plant and Refinery is under attack. A hacker is attempting to gain access to shut down the region's power and is using four attack hubs located around the country.
Take out the attacking hubs by selecting them and then correctly answering the questions. All four hubs must be taken offline before the power plant's defenses are depleted.
Good Luck!
(Click to Begin)
dialog.levelSuccess:
Congratulations, you have successfully protected the power plant.
You have done an outstanding job, and we apprehended the hacker. Your skills are some of the best we have seen around here.
I never had any doubt you could do it. Take care of yourself, and perhaps our paths will cross again someday.
(Click to Continue)
dialog.levelFailure:
You failed to protect the power plant.
The hacker was able to penetrate the network and shut down power for millions of residents. The target appreciates your efforts but is now forced to reimburse customers of their losses and make costly improvements to their network defenses.
There is no time to rest however, you should improve your skills and prepare yourself.
(Click to Replay)
